benchmark_details.name: TextAtari
benchmark_details.overview: TextAtari is a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating language agents on very long-horizon decision-making tasks spanning up to 100,000 steps.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate language agents' capacity for coherent decision-making across very long time horizons.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: TextAtari has substantial computational demands that may limit accessibility.

data.source: Atari 2600 games transformed into text format

methodology.calculation: Performance is evaluated based on completion of tasks within the specified number of decision steps.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is measured as a percentage of human player competence.
methodology.validation: Standardized evaluation protocols across different games.
